name: Bear Crawl
target: Full Body, Upper Body, Core, Lower Body
target_muscles: Shoulders, Chest, Triceps, Biceps, Back, Abs, Glutes, Hamstrings, Quadriceps, Calves
instruction: Get down on your hands and feet with your knees slightly bent and your back flat. Walk your left hand and your right foot forward. Walk your right hand and your left foot forward. Keep walking and alternating sides until the set is complete.
hints: Keep your knees slightly bent, your back flat and your arms straight. Engage your core, lift your hips, and exhale as you reach your hand and the opposite foot forward.
